alarms.name: TOOL BROKEN - NO SIGNAL
alarms.description: Touch sensor input not detected during M120

fix_procedures.action: Check the flagged line in the program for syntax errors
Verify G-code and M-code compatibility with controller
Check for missing required codes (tool number, speed, etc.)
Home the affected axis
Check for chip buildup on linear scales or encoder
Clean scale read head and verify gap distance
Inspect coupling between motor and ballscrew
Check ballscrew backlash with dial indicator
Verify encoder signals with oscilloscope (clean sine/cosine)
Check the flagged line in the program for syntax errors
Verify G-code and M-code compatibility with controller
Check for missing required codes (tool number, speed, etc.)
